snippet: Roger Federer rallied to beat Milos Raonic, 4-6, 7-5, 7-6 (4), in the second round of the Madrid Open to narrowly avoid his earliest tournament exit in two years.
abstract: Roger Federer rallies to defeat Milos Raonic in second round of the Madrid Open, narrowly avoiding his earliest tournament exit in two years.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer rallied to beat Milos Raonic, 4-6, 7-5, 7-6 (4), in the second round of the Madrid Open to narrowly avoid his earliest tournament exit in two years.

headline.seo: Roger Federer Escapes in Second Round of Madrid Open
